author: spingel
content: Geth devs: In some logs from Besu I saw that geth is sometimes only responding with one header when I'm requesting 200 block headers with a skip. Why would that happen?

author: fradamt
content: if we're going to go with this more general approach, it might make sense to separate exits and partial withdrawals so that they each have an independent fee market

author: m.kalinin
content: I believe the simplification is only on the block structure side. Having 7002 queue split into two is an orthogonal thing, but the Requests proposal makes the split less complicated
